statements: DELETE FROM extraction_and_transformation WHERE data_type = 'CSV' AND extraction_method = 'API';
DELETE FROM extraction_and_transformation WHERE data_type = 'CSV' AND extraction_method = 'API';
DELETE FROM extraction_and_transformation WHERE data_type = 'JSON' OR data_source = 'Database' AND extraction_method = 'ETL';
DELETE FROM data_transformations WHERE extraction_source_id = 3 AND created_at < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM data_sources_mapping WHERE source_id = 10 AND transformation_id = 5;
DELETE FROM SourceMapping WHERE source_name = 'ABC' AND source_type = 'TypeA';
